snippet: Ahmed Musa’s late goal delivered a 1-0 win for Nigeria over host Kenya and put the team at the top of its World Cup qualifying group.
abstract: Nigeria defeats Kenya, 1-0, to put the soccer team at the top of its World Cup qualifying group; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ahmed Musa’s late goal delivered a 1-0 win for Nigeria over host Kenya and put the team at the top of its World Cup qualifying group.

headline.print_headline: Late Goal Lifts Nigeria in Cup Qualifying
